affiliate_program_take_advantage: Take advantage of our fair commission structure and earn up to 25% from every sale!
affiliate_program_when_you_send: When you send a customer to the Openexpo Partner Programme, we commit to sharing the rewards with you for the lifetime of their activity on our Platform.
affiliate_program_share_text_top: We believe that Revenue Share is the fairest way for us to share the risks and rewards with you. We have a tiered structure that allows you to earn between 15% and 25% net revenue share a month.
affiliate_program_share_text_bot: The calculation of Gross Revenue to Net Revenue covers the fees we have to cover for things like transactions, licensing, royalties and applicable taxes.

affiliate_program_we_give_you: We'll give you all the help that YOU needâ€¦ whatever your level of experience.
affiliate_program_fill_the_form: Fill out the form - it won't take more than a couple of minutes.
affiliate_program_team_game: It's a Team Game so let's work together to drive traffic and increase revenues.
contact_success_modal_message: Your request has been successfully sent
affiliate_program_description: Join our partner program and earn up to 25% commissions for every client that will use our platform referred by you.
